# ADVENT OF CODE CHALLANGES

These are my solution to advent of code challanges, also a bits of my Python learning process.

## YEAR: 2020 [<a href='https://adventofcode.com/'>Link</a>]
This was the very first part of my Python learning process, so the solutions here are gathered from various sources to help me solve the problems, also to help me understand how certain <code>methods</code> work.
